title: Tablecloth, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace of discontinuous tape
description: Lace tablecloth of dense scrolling leaves sheltering birds and animals. Mermaids in each corner and in the field. Vertically and horizontally symmetrical.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tablecloth, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace of discontinuous tape. Gift of Isabel Shults. 1974-78-1.
